'''v0.11.0 alpha build 12''' is the twelfth build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.11.0 alpha|0.11.0]].

== Changes ==

* Removed extra [[item]]s (like different types of [[sword]]s) from the [[creative]] [[inventory]]
* Changed the way the select [[skin]] is highlighted

== Fixes ==

'''[https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MCPE/fixforversion/15325 23 bugs fixed]'''

* Fixed crash when the client uses the last item of a stack
* Fixed crash when breaking [[flower]]s/[[mushroom]]s
* Fixed crash when being disconnected while the game is suspended
* Fixed [[bucket]]s being unable to be used under[[water]]
* It’s now easier to get into [[boat]]s while holding a boat in your hand (underwater)
* Creative players can no longer be set on [[fire]]
* Tiny [[slime]]s no longer spawn in [[Peaceful]]
* Skins are now centered on the [[skin pack]] screen
* Fixed several localization issues

'''From released versions before 0.11.0'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8039}} - The player get damages when connecting to [[survival]] [[server]]s
* {{bug|MCPE-8099}} - [[Chicken]]s walk on water

'''From the 0.11.0 development versions'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8164}} - Fishing button while on a boat
* {{bug|MCPE-8224}} - Clients are not losing inventory while they die
* {{bug|MCPE-8225}} - Client's [[food]] doesn't consume upon use
* {{bug|MCPE-8291}} - World List shows all worlds as having been played "Today" (even very old worlds)
* {{bug|MCPE-8328}} - [[Grass]] not spreading
* {{bug|MCPE-8345}} - [[Mob]] effects not dealing true damage
* {{bug|MCPE-8428}} - [[Cave Spider]] [[monster Spawner|Spawner]] does not generate in [[Mineshaft]]
* {{bug|MCPE-8435}} - Boat type changing upon exiting the world
* {{bug|MCPE-8458}} - Build 10 interaction range increase also affects survival mode when split controls off
* {{bug|MCPE-8482}} - Arrow flies in wrong directon when in a boat

'''From the previous development version'''
* {{bug|MCPE-8496}} - Fire on player does not go off
* {{bug|MCPE-8506}} - Axes incorrect order in inventory</onlyinclude>
